question: More and more animals are becoming extinct because of human activities both on land and in water. What are some of the activities that cause this extinction? How can we help prevent this?
text: The extinction of animals is becoming increasingly serious on the planet. Although mankind's activities threaten many mammals, Their consequences can also be combated successfully.
